member.name: T:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig
member.summary: The Mastery-related settings for PRFS.

member.name: T:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.GoldPalette
member.summary: A palette used for golden icons and sprites.

member.name: F:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.GoldPalette.SiliconGold
member.summary: Gold palette made by silicon.

member.name: F:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.GoldPalette.KawaiiRoseGold
member.summary: Rose-gold palette made by KawaiiMuski.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LockMasteryUntilFullReset
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prevent the player from purchasing a skill Mastery if there are professions left to acquire.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.EnableLimitBreaks
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to allow Limit Breaks to be used in-game.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LimitBreakKey
member.summary: Gets the mod key used to activate the Limit Break.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.HoldKeyToLimitBreak
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Limit Break is activated by holding the , as opposed to simply pressing.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.HoldDelayMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets how long the should be held to activate the Limit Break, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LimitGainFactor
member.summary: Gets the rate at which one builds the Limit gauge. Increase this if you feel the gauge raises too slowly.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LimitDrainFactor
member.summary: Gets the rate at which the Limit gauge depletes during LimitBreak. Decrease this to make the Limit Break last longer.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LimitRespecCost
member.summary: Gets monetary cost of changing the chosen Limit Break. Set to 0 to change for free.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.LimitGaugeOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset that should be applied to the Limit Gauge's position.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.EnablePrestigeLevels
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the player can gain levels up to 20 and choose Prestiged professions.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.ExpPerPrestigeLevel
member.summary: Gets how much skill experience is required for each level up beyond 10.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.PrestigeRespecCost
member.summary: Gets the monetary cost of respecing prestige profession choices for a skill. Set to 0 to respec for free.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.MasteriesConfig.GoldSpritePalette
member.summary: Gets the style of the sprite used for mastered skill icons, prestige profession icons and the special Gold Slime. Accepted values: "SiliconGold", "KawaiiRoseGold".

member.name: T:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig
member.summary: The Skill-related settings for PRFS.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.EnableSkillReset
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the player can reset their skills to gain a new profession.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.SkillResetCostMultiplier
member.summary: Gets the base skill reset cost multiplier. Set to 0 to reset for free.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.ForgetRecipesOnSkillReset
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether resetting a skill also clears all corresponding recipes.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.AllowMultipleResets
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the player can use the Statue of Uncertainty more than once per day.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.SkillExpMultiplierPerReset
member.summary: Gets a multiplier applied to a skill's experience gain after a respective skill reset. Negative values mean it becomes harder to regain those levels.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.Framework.Configs.SkillsConfig.BaseMultipliers
member.summary: Gets a multiplier that will be applied to all skill experience gained from the start of the game.

member.summary: The health bar should appear only on the HUD.

member.summary: The health bar should appear both on the HUD and underneath the sprite.

member.summary: The heath bar should not appear at all.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ModKey
member.summary: Gets mod key used by Prospector and Scavenger professions (also Demolitionist).

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.LaxOwnershipRequirements
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether if enabled, machine and building ownership will be ignored when determining whether to apply profession bonuses.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ShouldJunimosInheritProfessions
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether determines whether Harvester and Agriculturist perks should apply to crops harvested by Junimos.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.EnableGoldenOstrichMayo
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to set golden and ostrich egg machine outputs to corresponding new mayo items.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ImmersiveDairyYield
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether large eggs and milk should yield twice the output stack instead of higher quality.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.BeesAreAnimals
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether Bee House products should be affected by Producer bonuses.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.BreederFriendlyAnimalMultiplier
member.summary: Gets the multiplier applied to the value of friendly animals sold by Breeder. This should only be used to compensate for third-party profit balancing mods.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ForagesNeededForBestQuality
member.summary: Gets the number of items that must be foraged before foraged items become iridium-quality.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.MineralsNeededForBestQuality
member.summary: Gets the number of minerals that must be mined before mined minerals become iridium-quality.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.TreasureHuntTriggerModifier
member.summary: Gets a multiplier applied to the point threshold to trigger a Scavenger or Prospector hunt.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.AllowScavengerHuntsOnFarm
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether determines whether a Scavenger Hunt can trigger while entering a farm map.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ScavengerHuntRange
member.summary: Gets the distance to the treasure tile at which the scavenger tracker disappears.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ScavengerHuntTimeLimit
member.summary: Gets the time limit of the scavenger hunt.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ProspectorHuntTimeLimit
member.summary: Gets the time limit of the prospector hunt.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.TrackingPointerScale
member.summary: Gets the size of the pointer used to track objects by Prospector and Scavenger professions.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.TrackingPointerBobRate
member.summary: Gets the speed at which the tracking pointer bounces up and down (higher is faster).

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.DisableAlwaysTrack
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether Prospector and Scavenger will only track off-screen object while is held.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.AnglerPriceBonusCeiling
member.summary: Gets the maximum multiplier that will be added to fish sold by Angler. if multiple new fish mods are installed, you may want to adjust this to a sensible value.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ShowFishCollectionMaxIcon
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to display the MAX icon below fish in the Collections Menu which have been caught at the maximum size.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.AquaristFishPondCeiling
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of Fish Ponds that will be counted for catching bar loss compensation.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ConservationistTrashNeededPerTaxDeduction
member.summary: Gets the amount of junk items that must be collected from crab pots for every 1% of tax deduction the following season.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ConservationistTrashNeededPerFriendshipPoint
member.summary: Gets the amount of junk items that must be collected from crab pots for every 1 point of friendship towards villagers.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ConservationistTaxDeductionCeiling
member.summary: Gets the maximum income deduction allowed by the Ferngill Revenue Service.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.Pyromania
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to replace the tame Pyrotechnician with the wild Pyromaniac.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.ImmersiveHeavyTapperYield
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether heavy tappers should yield twice the output stack instead of produce faster. This makes it more consistent with the new Heavy Furnace and less redudant with the Tapper profession.

member.name: P:DaLion.Professions.ProfessionsConfig.AgingTreesQualitySyrups

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to draw the currently equipped ammo over the slingshot's tooltip.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating where a minion's health bar should be drawn.

Qualified produce IDs should begin with "(O)".".

member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Whether to add new Golden and Ostrich Mayonnaise items to the game in order to make Artisan produce more consistent.".

member.name: F:DaLion.Professions.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ImmersiveDairyYield_Title
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Immersive Dairy Yields".

member.name: F:DaLion.Professions.I18n.Keys.Gmcm_ImmersiveDairyYield_Desc
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "Causes one large egg or milk to produce two mayonnaise or cheese but at regular quality, instead of one at gold quality. This makes the Artisan profession perk more consistent. If Ostrich Mayo is not enabled, Ostrich Eggs still yield 10 mayonnaise but do not retain input quality. If Golden Mayo is not enabled, a Gold Egg will yield a single mayonnaise, but always at the highest quality.".

By default this is balanced for vanilla; you should increase this number if using mods which add many new forageables. Settings to zero restores the vanilla Botanist behavior.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Professions.I18n.Gmcm_EnableGoldenOstrichMayo_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Whether to add new Golden and Ostrich Mayonnaise items to the game in order to make Artisan produce more consistent.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Professions.I18n.Gmcm_ImmersiveDairyYield_Title
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Immersive Dairy Yields".

member.name: M:DaLion.Professions.I18n.Gmcm_ImmersiveDairyYield_Desc
member.summary: Get a translation equivalent to "Causes one large egg or milk to produce two mayonnaise or cheese but at regular quality, instead of one at gold quality. This makes the Artisan profession perk more consistent. If Ostrich Mayo is not enabled, Ostrich Eggs still yield 10 mayonnaise but do not retain input quality. If Golden Mayo is not enabled, a Gold Egg will yield a single mayonnaise, but always at the highest quality.".

member.name: M:DaLion.Professions.I18n.GetByKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a translation by its key.
member.param: The translation key.
An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.
member.remarks: You should usually use a strongly-typed method like instead.

member.name: T:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute
member.summary: Add to enums to indicate that extension methods should be generated for the type

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassNamespace
member.summary: The namespace to generate the extension class. If not provided the namespace of the enum will be used

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassName
member.summary: The name to use for the extension class. If not provided, the enum name with "Extensions" will be used. For example for an Enum called StatusCodes, the default name will be StatusCodesExtensions
